name: lambda-contact
author: Michael Bausano <bausanomichal@gmail.com>
description: Sends an email to env configurable recepients via SES.

scripts.create:stage: claudia create --name stage-contact --region eu-west-1 --handler index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::365488455739:role/lambda_dynamo_db --config claudia-stage.json
scripts.create:prod: claudia create --name prod-contact --region eu-west-1 --handler index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::365488455739:role/lambda_dynamo_db --config claudia-prod.json
